    • Method Detail

      • createEndpointList

        public static java.util.List<java.net.URI> createEndpointList(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> clientEndpoints)
        Returns:
        a List of URI that hold the location of end-points to which the local RestfulDiffuser can diffuse method calls.

      • validateEndpoints

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> validateEndpoints(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> clientEndpoints)
        Validates each end-point specified in the list. If the end-point is valid, then it adds it the return list, otherwise it logs a warning with the invalid end-point address.
        Parameters:
        clientEndpoints - The list of end-points of the client
        Returns:
        A validated list of end-points.
